name: dibdiadm
params: class c0, class c1, class c2, class c3, class c4, class c5
body: |- wi(wa(wcel(c0, c1), wcel(c2, c3)), wceq(cdm(c4), cdm(c5)))

stmt.pretty: syl((c0 ∈ c1 ∧ c2 ∈ c3), dom(c4)= dom(c5), c4[Fn]dom(c5))

body.origin:
|- wi(wa(wcel(c0, c1), wcel(c2, c3)), wceq(cdm(c4), cdm(c5)))
